word: THE STENOGRAPHIC REPORT OF THIS MEETING HAS REMAINED IN THE GENERAL SUBJECT FILE OF THE WHITE ESTATE (DOCUMENT FILE NO. 102) IN A FOLDER RELATING TO CHURCH SCHOOLS, BUT WITH THE UNCHALLENGING COVER TITLE OF "REPORT OF A MEETING OF THE CHURCH SCHOOL BOARD, SANITARIUM CALIFORNIA, JANUARY 14, 1904." CONCENTRATED RESEARCH IN THE AREA OF EDUCATION ONLY RECENTLY BROUGHT TO LIGHT THIS DOCUMENT.
